column4: in 10.04 before it boots i get bunch of errors like this: cannot enable port 2, maybe the usb cable is bad...unable to enumerate USB device on port2, and __ext4_get_inode_loc: unable to read . anyone have idea what might solve this?
Can you get the output of dmesg into a paste bin?
Oh and what USB devices do you have plugged in?
not really, running it on other monitor.its some verbatim 8gb stick, worked well with 9.10
